original_text: But do not be afraid of them; remember well what the Lord your God did to Pharaoh and to all Egypt.
korean_text: 그들을 두려워하지 말고 네 하나님 여호와께서 바로와 온 애굽에 행하신 것을 잘 기억하되

sentences.original_text: But do not be afraid of them
remember well what the Lord your God did
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 하나님이 하신 일을 잘 기억하라

sentences.original_text: to Pharaoh and to all Egypt
